name: AIA_Classification_GeneratePromptExamples
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!examples: rule!AIA_GetModelVersionExamples(
    modelVersion: ri!modelVersion
  ),
  if(
    /*even if there are no bounding boxes, still include the examples*/
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!examples),
    "",
    "

Here are some examples:
" & joinarray(
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    local!examples,
    "
<example>
<input>" & fv!item[recordType!AIA Model Version Example.input] & "</input>
<output>" & fv!item[recordType!AIA Model Version Example.output] & "</output>
</example>"
  ),
  "
"
)
  )
)
